Forgot to mention
Fruity Wrapper.dll goes in

"FL Studio 10/Plugins/Fruity/Generators/FruityWrapper"

~Nexus 2.3.4 IMPORT DATA BUGS~
-Importing Licenses dosen't always import it properly (It says "License imported successfully" but when you import the expansion that went with that License it will say "License Not Found"
-Importing a License then a Expansion may SOMETIMES work properly (Depeding on the .key data) but still wont be able to play any presets
-Some Expansions (ROM, Mabye Dance.Vol2?) import WITHOUT a license (This makes it so you cant play any of the presets). ROM and Dance Vol.2 should work fine with a license but they dont due to this problem.
